column4: I need help with grub. (linux noob) i edited grub boot order to start windows 7 as default as Ubuntu 10.10 is my first step into linux. Changed default 0 to default 5 rebooted and its now booting to memory test but the keyboard stops working when bootloader starts so i cant select ubuntu or windows 7. Can anybody help me fix this. I have tried reinstalling grub with live cd, it finished fine but on reboot same bootloader pro
use a livecd to edit the bootloader again
how do i edit bootloader with live cd it wont let me edit the file? (Sorry Noob)
